title: LW Party: Bay Area Invitation
summary:
Key ideas
- Less Wrong is hosting a party for Bay Area SSC (Slate Star Codex) readers as an experiment.
- The party will take place at a private house in Berkeley.
- The party will feature interesting people, including the Less Wrong website team.

Key learnings
- Blog posts can be used as a means to invite people to events.
- Parties can be used as a way to bring together like-minded individuals.

Key questions
- Will inviting people to parties via blog be successful?
- How many people will attend the party?
- Will the party be a good opportunity to meet new people?
